site_name: JOHNSONS CORNER FARM L L C

citations.narrative:
The licensee has not developed, documented or followed an appropriate contingency plan as required. This written plan
should have been in place by July 5, 2022. The contingency plan is necessary to ensure that animals are provided with
humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care in the event of an emergency or disaster.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: MARCH 15, 2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee has not developed, documented or followed an appropriate contingency plan as required.  This written plan 
should have been in place by July 5, 2022.  The contingency plan is necessary to ensure that animals are provided with 
humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  MARCH 15, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
